QueryResult.text: select max(depth) depth, pf.child_partition_code dal_partition_code, code, dal_code, dal_type from cmn_grids_partition_depth_v ovp, (select partition_code, child_partition_code from cmn_partitions_flat pfi union select 'NIKU.ROOT', code child_partition_code from cmn_partitions pi) pf where ovp.dal_partition_code = pf.partition_code group by pf.child_partition_code, code, dal_code, dal_type union select -1 depth, dal_partition_code, g.code, dal_code, dal_type from cmn_grids g where dal_partition_code = 'NIKU.ROOT'
